text.text:
Had a fantastic dining experience at Kabab Studio, located in Goldfinch Hotel Bengaluru. The restaurant offers an impressive spread with a wide variety of delicious starters, grills, mains, and desserts. Every dish we tried was flavorful and well-prepared — especially the live grills and kebabs, which stood out for their taste and quality.

The ambiance is vibrant with a rooftop setting that adds to the overall charm. The service was attentive and courteous throughout the evening. A great spot for buffet lovers looking for both variety and quality.

Highly recommend Kabab Studio for anyone wanting to enjoy a memorable dining experience in Bengaluru.

text.text:
The food at the hotel is genuinely good and probably the best part of the stay. However, the rest of the experience was Okay. The room provided was quite small and not worth the price.

The management was overly money-minded, constantly insisting on advance payments—even for bookings over two days—which felt unnecessary and pushy. On top of that, they have very rigid policies: guests are not allowed to visit, and outside food is strictly prohibited. These restrictions made the stay feel more like a controlled environment than a comfortable hotel experience.

Overall, I wouldn’t recommend this place unless you’re just going for a quick meal.

text.text: Being a 5 star property, I thought this place felt like a bit of a downgrade. The lobby appeared uninviting due to its dull lighting however the looming centerpiece statue was impressive. The carpet covering the corridors were dirty and old. The doors looked like dormitory ones, they entrance to the rooms should exude luxury which it lacked. I booked a room with balcony however the view was of the back side of a building. I understand you can't get scenic views in a city however this balcony served me no purpose except for drying my socks. The bed was extremely comfortable and I had a good night's sleep so 5/5 on that. The bathroom had a tub which was a plus point. The breakfast spread had variety and the chef at the live counter prepared a very delicious omelet for me. I enjoyed my meal and would come back for it. The check in and check out process were quick and without any hassle.

text.text:
We stayed at Hotel Royal Orchid in a Deluxe King Size Room from June 21 to July 4 as a family with a child, and had a really enjoyable experience.

The staff were friendly and helpful, especially when it came to housekeeping — the room could’ve been a bit cleaner at first, but they responded quickly and took care of it when asked. The hotel amenities were great and added a lot to our stay, especially with a kid — everything felt safe, comfortable, and well-managed.

Dining was excellent — good variety, tasty food, and smooth service. The location is convenient, and the overall vibe of the hotel is relaxed yet elegant. Check-in and check-out were quick, and the room was spacious enough for a small family.

Overall, a solid stay with a few minor areas for improvement. Would definitely consider coming back!

text.text:
From the moment I arrived, I was enchanted by this hotel. The grounds are simply stunning, a lush green paradise that feels like a tranquil escape from the world. Every corner is meticulously maintained, with vibrant gardens and towering trees creating a serene and beautiful atmosphere. It was a true pleasure to stroll through the pathways, and the constant presence of nature made the entire stay feel incredibly rejuvenating.

I must also extend a special thank you to Tia at the front desk. Her warm and welcoming demeanor made check-in a breeze. She was incredibly helpful throughout my stay, always ready with a smile and excellent recommendations. Her professionalism and genuine kindness are a true asset to the hotel, and she made a significant positive impact on my experience.

This hotel is a perfect choice for anyone seeking beauty, tranquility, and exceptional service. I can't wait to return to this green oasis Royal Orchid in middle of Bangalore City

text.text:
I had a fantastic stay at Hotel Royal Orchid near HAL. From check-in to check-out, everything was seamless. A special shoutout to the housekeeping team on the 3rd floor – Ranesh and Santhosh. Their work was outstanding. Even when we weren’t in the room, they ensured everything stayed perfectly clean and organized. I noticed it right from Day 1 – spotless floors, fresh linens, neatly arranged amenities. They genuinely care about maintaining the highest standards.

The hotel itself is elegant, peaceful, and professionally run. Rooms are comfortable, the service is quick, and the staff are polite and attentive. It's an ideal spot for both business travelers and families.

Highly recommended. Will definitely return.

text.text:
Stayed here last night booking ID - 2Z890SRB for reference purpose for the Hotel Management Team to verify and overall, the experience was disappointing — with one major exception: the breakfast.

Melange Restaurant served a genuinely enjoyable breakfast. The selection was decent, but the French toast stood out — perfectly cooked, lightly crisped, and absolutely delicious. It was the only part of the stay that felt like it belonged in a higher-rated hotel.

Unfortunately, everything else fell flat. The rooms were shockingly small, barely enough space to walk around the bed as compared to it was priced at.

Worse still, the air-conditioning was a nightmare. The room remained uncomfortably warm and stuffy throughout my stay, with no proper airflow. To make matters worse, the temperature setting couldn’t be reduced below 21°C, which made it almost suffocating and unable to sleep the whole night.

This hotel might work if you’re just dropping by for breakfast lunch or dinner, but I wouldn’t recommend it for a stay. The great French toast just doesn’t make up for the lack of basic comfort in the rooms.

text.text:
My husband and I stayed here 3X for business most of the time, and the last visit was business/vacation.

We normally arrive very early in the morning, and the reception staff has always been accommodating, offering our requests such as early breakfast or late evening meals.

The room was always clean and inviting, making for a great stay. The housekeeping staff was always attentive to cleaning necessary things upon daily cleaning and even very helpful with laundry. They even extended their service when we found out one of the t-shirts was stained, and they offered to fix it and even offered our free laundry service. We also went to their spa, restaurants, gym, and pool.

Overall, we are very pleased with the excellent hospitality of the staff in any department. Thus, whenever we have a business trip, we always choose/book the Radisson Blu Hotel.

Happy to recommend it not only for business but also for vacation.

It’s a good hotel, has all the normal amenities. Room was fine though I did hear construction noises on some of the days. Only minor complaint is the towels weren’t very plush, they somehow felt wet. Gym is pretty decent with a smith press machine etc. didn’t try the pool. Breakfast and dinner buffets were fine, pretty standard affairs, service staff were courteous most of the time.

It isn’t as grand as some of the others in the area but it’s priced much better so it depends on what you are looking for.

It’s a good hotel, has all the normal amenities. Room was fine though I did hear construction noises on some of the days. Only minor complaint is the towels weren’t very plush, they somehow felt wet. Gym is pretty decent with a smith press machine etc. didn’t try the pool. Breakfast and dinner buffets were fine, pretty standard affairs, service staff were courteous most of the time.

It isn’t as grand as some of the others in the area but it’s priced much better so it depends on what you are looking for.

One good point of hotel is that there is a small mall next door so that was convenient.

text.text: I mostly take issue with this being classified as a 5 star resort. Generally, the hotel was good, just not 5 star.  Rooms were clean but on the smaller side, and dated. My deadbolt did not work. Food was good, but buffet is not as extensive as those you find at other brands in the area like Marriott properties. The service was friendly. The workout room was good. I worked strange hours and was hoping for more late dining options besides a big buffet at 10pm. I asked about the bar, thinking I could get a small bite, but they point in the direction of the main restaurant and although I asked twice, no one thought to explain how to get there beyond pointing from the lobby to the restaurant. I prefer the larger hotels with multiple options for food. One night I ordered room service which was fine, but they couldn't bring me a cocktail and they couldn't tell me why or what they could bring, just that they didn't have what I was asking for, so I don't know if it was time or policy or selection (I asked for 2-3 different options to make sure it wasn't an ingredient). Overall, it was fine, but just fine. Location was outstanding working from ITPL.

text.text:
Stay at Vivanta was just fine, stayed with family. Staff at dining was very friendly and supportive, as my 1yr kid made lot of chaos. Faced some issues during booking, was guided wrongly. While booking, I clearly mentioned for lunch buffet, but after reaching there, they said Sunday only brunch is available and I can't opt it and need to go for dinner buffet, this was very bad first impression. There was some repair work going on, but staff was prompt enough to change the room from king size bed to queen size bed 😂, had to adjust for that. Wasn't expecting such adjustment will be required at Vivanta, Taj group. Even though it is 5 star, didn't feel like.
Had dinner & breakfast buffets, but I felt it lacked the spread variety, felt Novotel had better spread than here. In dinner spread 3 main fish dishes were there, they could have replaced atleast 1 dish with prawn variety. Also papdi chaat was totally soaked in curd, not at all good and I'm a big fan of chaats, it was a big disappointment for me.

text.text:
I recently stayed at the Vivanta Hotel in Bangalore. Overall, it was a pleasant experience. The staff is very friendly and professional, and the rooms are spotless and well-maintained.

However, one major downside: as soon as the air conditioning is turned on, a strong smell of cigarette smoke comes through, which is quite unpleasant—especially for non-smokers.

On the dining side, the restaurant is excellent, particularly for dinner. The menu is rich, varied, and the food is delicious. In contrast, the breakfast is quite average, with a more limited selection and inconsistent quality.

In summary: a very good hotel for its service and evening dining, but improvements are needed in air circulation and the breakfast offering.

editorialSummary.text: Basic accommodations in a secluded safari lodge offering rooftop dining & nature walks.

text.text: Bannerghatta Nature Camp - Jungle Lodges is an excellent choice to spend a weekend or a long weekend, especially if you have kids. The property is nestled in a beautiful forest area with lovely trees all around, the rooms are clean and spacious, and the staff are caring and courteous. There's a large kids' play area with a rope obstacle course that keeps the little ones busy and happy. Food is delicious and tastes home-cooked. We went for the safari and nature walk with Puttanaika, a naturalist. He is really good and kept us engaged with interesting information and trivia about the forest and the wildlife. Thank you for a wonderful stay!

text.text:
A big thank you to the entire team at Gokulam Grand Hotel & Spa!

I had the chance to stay at this hotel for six weeks during my very first trip abroad, and everything went extremely well.

The staff is exceptional: always attentive, friendly, and smiling—whether at the front desk, the bar, or the My Place restaurant. You feel welcome and well taken care of from the moment you arrive. Some staff members even spoke a little French, which added a fun and friendly touch to the experience.

The rooms and common areas are clean and well maintained. Of course, there's always room for improvement, but it’s already very good and more than comfortable for a long stay. If any small issues came up, the staff was quick to respond, which is much appreciated.

A few points could be improved:

The gym is a bit outdated.

The pool is nice, but not well-oriented for sun exposure, so the water is quite cold.

The rooftop was not accessible. It’s been closed for several years I think, which was a real disappointment, especially since I was looking forward to enjoying it.

The hotel is located a bit off the main road, on a small side street. The upside is that it’s peaceful, with no traffic noise. However, since the hotel is quite far from downtown Bangalore, you should expect about an hour’s drive if you want to enjoy the city’s atmosphere and activities. On the positive side, the location is convenient for the airport and for nearby business areas, which was ideal in my case.

I want to sincerely thank all the hotel staff. I won’t mention any names here, for fear of forgetting someone, but everyone—from the reception to the bar and restaurant—will recognize themselves. Thank you for your kindness and professionalism.

I truly enjoyed my six-week stay at this hotel. Thanks again to all the teams!

text.text:
My experience at Fortune Park JP Celestial was highly satisfying. The hotel is well maintained, the rooms are spacious and comfortable, and the restaurant offers a good variety of delicious food. Overall, the property provides a pleasant balance of comfort and service.

I would particularly like to commend the Duty Manager, Mendes, whose professionalism and attention to detail set a high standard. His proactive approach, courteous demeanour, and commitment to guest satisfaction made the entire stay feel effortless and well cared for.

The rest of the staff were equally courteous and attentive, which reflects the hotel’s strong culture of hospitality. I would gladly recommend this property to anyone visiting Bengaluru.

I want to write a few words from my heart for the staff as they made us very happy during our 4 nights here …

In fact the entire staff from the guard at the main door to all the people , the housekeepers, room service staff & many whose names I don’t know but I want to express my appreciation & gratitude for all their Smiles , help & courtesy A Big THANK YOU 🙏🏽❤️

text.text:
Visited the restaurant for a corporate dinner event. We were about 50 people and occupied the second floor pool area (using pool wasn't allowed)

Decent priced packages came with a complimentary beer/mocktail per person.

Pros:
- good space and view from the pool area
- enough space to host 50-75 people
- great appetizers and food
- hospitable staff

Cons:
- no direct access from parking to the hotel (need to walk out to the ground floor to use the elevator)
- beer or mocktail were part of one coupon - doesn't justify that an alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverage be clubbed for an either/or option. Mocktails should not be limited to just one drink
- they continuously played jazz music even after requesting. They didn't have an option to change

text.text:
This hotel presents an excellent choice for those looking to escape the bustling streets of downtown Bangalore and its notorious traffic jams. The accommodations are spacious, featuring both junior and two-bay suites that provide a comfortable retreat. Dining options are appealing, with two notable restaurants: the inviting Great Room and the charming Verandah, where guests can savor a variety of dishes.

I was particularly impressed by Preeti, who went above and beyond to assist with every request I had, showcasing remarkable hospitality. However, the menu could benefit from the addition of a steak selection to further enhance the dining experience.

Conveniently located adjacent to the Uptown Orion Mall, the hotel offers easy access to a wide array of shopping and dining options, including a lively food court. Overall, this hotel stands out as a solid choice in a prime location, supported by an exceptionally attentive staff. While the cleanliness of the facilities is an area for improvement, the overall experience makes it a worthwhile option for travelers.

text.text:
Exceptional Stay — Highly Recommended!

I had a truly wonderful experience at this hotel. From the moment I arrived, the staff made me feel incredibly welcome — professional, attentive, and always ready to help with a smile. Their hospitality really elevated my stay.

The food was absolutely delicious, with a wide variety of options that catered to every taste. Whether it was breakfast, lunch, or dinner, each meal was fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented.

The ambience throughout the hotel is calming and elegant — a perfect blend of comfort and style. Whether relaxing in the lobby or enjoying the view from the lounge, every space feels thoughtfully designed.

I was especially impressed with how well-maintained everything was. The rooms were spotless, common areas were always clean, and attention to detail was clearly a top priority for the management.

All in all, a 5-star experience in every sense. I’d gladly return and highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a memorable and comfortable stay!

And at last thanks to one of the staff member named Vansh Gupta for the warn hospitality.

text.text:
A Perfect Stay — Will Definitely Come Back!

My recent stay at this hotel exceeded all expectations. The staff were outstanding — courteous, well-trained, and genuinely eager to ensure a smooth and pleasant experience. Every interaction, from check-in to check-out, was handled with care and professionalism.

The food deserves a special mention. Each meal was thoughtfully prepared with high-quality ingredients and offered a great mix of local and international dishes. I especially enjoyed the breakfast buffet — fresh, varied, and well organized.

The ambience throughout the hotel was both elegant and relaxing. Whether in the room, the restaurant, or the common areas, everything felt inviting and tastefully designed. It’s the kind of place where you immediately feel at ease.

I also appreciated the high level of maintenance. The rooms were spotless, the facilities were in excellent condition, and everything functioned as it should. Cleanliness and upkeep clearly matter here, and it shows.

Truly a 5-star experience — I’m already looking forward to my next visit!

text.text:
An underwhelming stay that just didn’t feel like a stay at a Marriott property. And as a lifetime gold elite, I would know.
Rooms are not maintained well. Things are broken, cracked, bathroom isn’t properly cleaned. Our TV set top box had to be changed pretty much as soon as we checked in. However, the technician came promptly and rectified the situation quickly. Wanted to have the Sunday brunch but were told the previous evening itself that nothing is available for some reason 😔 some drilling was going on somewhere. We requested a late checkout and the hotel extended that courtesy.

All in all, a less than satisfactory stay by Marriott standards.

Edit: after I posted the review I was contacted by the Asstt. Front Office Manager on how he could make it right. He felt that by “bribing” me with 2000 Bonvoy Points would make it right. I have asked them to reverse the credit but that has not been done.

editorialSummary.text: Warm rooms with antique furnishings in an elegant guesthouse offering a garden & breakfast.

text.text:
We stayed here with our group of friends. The rooms were just okay in terms of cleanliness, and the overall setup was average. However, the major disappointment was the staff — they were not supportive at all. Even basic things like tea were not provided outside the strict breakfast timings. After 10:30 AM, they refused to serve even a single cup of tea, which was quite frustrating.

There are no nearby shops either for tea or other basic needs, which made it even more inconvenient. The staff seemed very rigid about check-out and breakfast timings, which didn’t leave a great impression. Honestly, I didn’t like this place much.

The only good thing is that it’s located near MG Road, so it's convenient for going out and enjoying places like Hangover. Other than the location, I wouldn't recommend this stay.

text.text:
The worst experience of all time!!! Beware when booking and stay clear. I was arriving December 15 at 2am. So I insisted and insisted and triple confirmed that I can check in on time, the room was booked for December 14 - naturally. After this was confirmed over and over, I arrived in the middle of the night and the place seemed abandoned. Then I managed to wake up the drivers security guard, who informed me that check in is at 11. I’m really not sure why I wasted hours on back and forth email, confirmations, and all that to be stranded in the middle of the night. Appalling! Also I managed to use the lobby bathroom and it was gross.

I ended up going to a nearby hotel that’s much nicer and much cheaper. Some sort of reward for the hell I went through.

Laika Boutique Stay offers a charming escape in the midst of Bangalore's bustling city life. This cozy shared space provides a comfortable and affordable option for a short stay.

The wooden furniture and neat decor create a warm and inviting atmosphere. While the facilities are basic, they're sufficient for a night or two. The location is a major plus, with easy access to Bangalore's vibrant food and nightlife scene.

Whether you're a solo traveler or a group of friends, Laika Boutique Stay is a great choice for exploring the city.

text.text:
Dearest Hilton Bangalore,

I just wanted to express my sincere gratitude for your incredible hospitality. I was so touched when I wasn't feeling well, and your staff, Tanu, Susmita, Aati, Diya, Anuj, Harshit, Sandeep, Shivam, Ankit, Sikha, and Devendra, went above and beyond to care for me. They even got me dal khichdi, making me feel like I was being cared for by family away from home. The breakfast, lunch, and dinner were absolutely delicious, and the hot toddy was exactly what I needed. That special note was the sweetest touch!

It truly felt like being cared for by an extended family. Thank you for creating such a warm and welcoming environment. You've made a lasting impression, and I can't wait to visit again!

Warmly,
Karishma Lilwani

editorialSummary.text: Polished rooms & suites in a high-end hotel featuring free breakfast, a spa & an elegant restaurant.

text.text:
We recently stayed at Howard Johnson Bengaluru with 8 guests and had booked 3 rooms for our family. We travelled from Dubai and expected to be in a great place to stay. Unfortunately, the experience was far from what we expected for an international hotel with 4 Star rating. The experience was horrible.

1. The air conditioning in 2x rooms was completely non-functional, making it extremely uncomfortable, especially for children. Whereas 1x room AC was super chilled, something wrong with thermostats. We reported the issue to the management and no action was taken.
2. Additionally, all room keys consistently failed, causing further inconvenience every time we tried to access our rooms.
3. Clogged washrooms, broken flush panels resulted in not flushing the Pee and Poop properly. The technician came with plunger to unclogged the feces from WC. Attached pictures as proof.
4. Rusty and fungus in washrooms, unhygienic towels as if it’s in a 2 Star hotel. Cannot be compared with a 4 Star hotel.
5. Sticky plywood flooring in bedroom. It’s not mopped properly. One room has broken flooring.

For the price paid, this experience was unacceptable. It’s clear that the hotel has a serious and ongoing problem with its air conditioning system, maintenance issues, house keeping problems.

We strongly advise others to avoid this hotel. It was a nightmare for us, and certainly not worth the cost. I’m happy to share more information and feedback to owners, visitors and travel agents. There was multiple complaints since many months and management just acknowledges the feedback but no action was taken. And i’m sure this will also be nicely declined with a polite response.

text.text:
A Luxurious Stay with Excellent Comfort and Hospitality

I recently stayed at this 4-star property and was thoroughly impressed by the overall experience. The hotel exudes luxury from the moment you walk in — from the elegant interiors to the warm welcome by the reception staff, who were courteous, helpful, and efficient throughout the stay.

The room was a highlight: spacious, impeccably clean, and filled with natural sunlight during the day. The view from the room was lovely, adding a refreshing touch to the mornings. Thoughtful amenities like a mini bar, tea/coffee maker, and a spotless bathroom made the stay even more comfortable.

Food lovers will be delighted — the in-house dining options offered a wide variety of delicious dishes, catering to diverse tastes. Every meal was a treat, with both quality and variety standing out.

Room service was prompt and professional, ensuring every request was handled quickly and with a smile. Overall, this hotel offers a perfect balance of comfort, luxury, and top-notch hospitality. Highly recommended for both leisure and business travelers!

originalText.text: Absolutely amazing stay at Goldfinch Hotel! The rooms were spotless, the staff was incredibly friendly, and the food was top-notch. Highly recommend it.

text.text:
We recently hosted a get-together for Cohort 2 of SeSC, IISc Bangalore at the Silver Bills banquet hall, Goldfinch Hotels, Bangalore. We had around 80 attendees, and we are extremely pleased with the overall experience.

The venue arrangements were commendable. The cluster-based seating with round tables, neatly set linens, and a well-maintained, spacious hall provided a comfortable and professional environment. The stage, AV system, screen, and nearby washroom facilities were all in excellent condition and added to the seamless execution of the event.

A special mention to the food – it was truly outstanding. Our request for a diverse menu, including vegetarian, non-vegetarian, and Jain options, was handled positively and delivered at a reasonable price point. The quality and service of the food were top-notch, contributing greatly to the success of our event.

Additional amenities like valet parking ensured our guests had a hassle-free arrival, and the hotel rooms we viewed were luxurious, hygienic, and well-appointed.

We are grateful for the excellent support extended by Mr. Amit, Mr. James, and Mr. Vinod, who ensured smooth coordination throughout.

We highly recommend Goldfinch Hotels for conferences, reunions, parties, and similar gatherings.

The venue arrangements were commendable. The cluster-based seating with round tables, neatly set linens, and a well-maintained, spacious hall provided a comfortable and professional environment. The stage, AV system, screen, and nearby washroom facilities were all in excellent condition and added to the seamless execution of the event.

A special mention to the food – it was truly outstanding. Our request for a diverse menu, including vegetarian, non-vegetarian, and Jain options, was handled positively and delivered at a reasonable price point. The quality and service of the food were top-notch, contributing greatly to the success of our event.

Additional amenities like valet parking ensured our guests had a hassle-free arrival, and the hotel rooms we viewed were luxurious, hygienic, and well-appointed.

We are grateful for the excellent support extended by Mr. Amit, Mr. James, and Mr. Vinod, who ensured smooth coordination throughout.

We highly recommend Goldfinch Hotels for conferences, reunions, parties, and similar gatherings.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Fairfield by Marriott Outer Ring Road, and I must say, it was a delightful experience overall. Considering the category of the hotel, the level of service and amenities provided exceeded my expectations.

The room was clean, comfortable, and well-maintained. The bed was particularly comfortable, ensuring a good night's sleep after a long day. The amenities provided were thoughtful and practical, enhancing the overall comfort of the stay.

I also liked the breakfast spread and mainly the staff attentiveness to cater to this business crowd.

However, I did face a bit of inconvenience with the check-in and check-out processes. The waits were longer than expected, which was a minor hiccup in an otherwise smooth experience. Improving the efficiency of these processes would significantly enhance the guest experience.

text.text: The Park Bangalore is India's first ever-contemporary boutique hotel. This stylishly designed hotel has made its mark in the hospitality business and has featured in Tatler magazine's list of best 101 hotels in the world. The hotel is located on MG Road and offers ideal accessibility to the city's business and leisure areas. The state-of-the-art amenities provided by the hotel further adds to the comfort of the entire experience. The Park Bangalore also has a compelling range of restaurant and bar facilities. Monsoon, the 24-hour restaurant, serves exquisite International and Indian fare. Italia is considered as one of the best Italian restaurants in the country and has bagged several awards to its name. The i-Bar offers an envious range of imported liquor brands while the Aqua, a unique alfresco, pool-side lounge offers the perfect ambiance to settle down after a grueling day's work. All in all the Park Bangalore offers a holistic experience. One of the first boutique hotels in Bangalore located at Mahatma Gandhi Road exudes sophistication and intimacy. Home to extravagance - THE Park Bangalore is a place to relax your senses and pamper yourself with the best Bangalore has to offer. It promises complete indulgence with its facilities, restaurants and bars - making it a preferred destination of business travelers looking for restful hotel in the city.Every minute detail at THE Park Bangalor accentuates the unique and modern styling, meticulously crafted by Conran & Partners. The hotel provides an elevated standard of style, contemporary design and decor. Each floor is decorated to embody various landscapes, experiences, lifestyles and cultures from across India.State-of-the-art technology and amenities for commerce, leisure and relaxation makes THE Park Bangalore an ideal choice for guests for business, leisure or a weekend retreat. The Park Hotel located on Mahatma Gandhi Road, the heart of the city promises the best for travelers looking for luxury hotels in Bangalore.

text.text: Hotel Royal Orchid, Bangalore is the flagship hotel of Royal Orchid Hotels. Located in the heart of Bangalore, its close proximity to HAL Airport, 18-Hole KGA Golf Course, Central Business District ( CBD ), Diamond District, and Manipal Hospital makes it one of the best 5-star hotels in Bangalore. Spread across an expansive three acres of serene space, the hotel becomes the ideal destination for business and leisure travelers for its state-of-the-art facilities, fine dining venues, and dedicated services of the staff making the experience of every patron at Royal Orchid an unforgettable one. For the business travelers in the city, our hotel’s close proximity to various business and office areas such as Koramangala, Embassy Golf Links ( EGL ), Marthahalli, and Whitefield makes it convenient for an easy stay. If you want to enjoy the reverting nightlife of Bengaluru, then Indiranagar which has a number of restaurants, breweries, nightclubs is the best destination for you to explore. Offering the best accommodation in Bangalore like its Royal Club Room and Royal Suite having supreme amenities like LED IPTV with video on demand, Hotel Royal Orchid, Bangalore thrives to make your stay the most comfortable one. The hotel boasts of other lavish facilities like Roof Top heated Swimming Pool and 30,000 sq. ft. of green lawn which can accommodate 1000 people for weddings, any social or corporate events making it one of the best hotels in Bangalore with swimming pool. We visited the hotel for candle light dinner and the food/ambience was very good!

highlightedText.text: "Its a grand old 5 star hotel with great amenities and courteous staff."

text.text:
Its a grand old 5 star hotel with great amenities and courteous staff.

Its an affordable 5 star in the heart of the city, yet very green, serene and peaceful.

They have some very classy restaurants inside… one indoor with a great kitchen and fantastic buffet variety, one is open air with several wooden gazebos that can accommodate large groups, and one is along the lawn corridors with both indoor and outdoor seating.

The rooms are large and well kept.

The pool is on the terrace with several beach beds and more space for groups to hang out and chill.

There are plenty of places in this hotel where one would like to click pictures.

You can take a nice romantic walk post dinner in their lawns and around the hotel.

Theres ample parking spaces and ample greenery.

They have a separate smoking balcony on a top floor. The breeze there is something to die for. A large group can hand out here as well without worrying about disturbing any other guests.

The washrooms in each room have a glass window with blinds. This itself will kickstart your romantic mood.

They have toothpicks in the elevators (very creative) that you can use to push the buttons… a great help in these pandemic times.

They accept local IDs and are couple friendly.

Their lobby is also very classy and picturesque.

The staff are friend  and not judgemental.

Tip:
If you book 2 nights, you get the 3rd nite free. This info is only available on a placard at their reception and now “here”.
So call them before booking and enjoy the extra night.

And yes, do book their half board package… room + breakfast + dinner. Its totally worth it.

And their prices are just perfect.

Enjoy your stay here and like this review if you had a similar experience 😊

Request to hotel:
Please also create a full-board package with room + all meals.

text.text:
Title: Exceptional Experience at Radisson Blu

Rating: 5/5

Radisson Blu has always been one of my top choices for hotels, and my recent stay reaffirmed why it holds a special place in my heart. From the moment I stepped into the lobby, I was enchanted by the elegant decor and inviting ambiance.

The service at Radisson Blu is unparalleled. Every staff member went above and beyond to ensure my comfort and satisfaction throughout my stay. Whether it was the prompt room service or the attentive staff at breakfast, their dedication to providing exceptional service was evident.

Speaking of breakfast, it was a highlight of my stay. The variety and quality of dishes offered were outstanding, and it truly set a positive tone for the rest of my day.

One aspect that stands out at Radisson Blu is their Food and Beverage team. Their attention to detail and willingness to accommodate any request truly sets them apart. Even the slightest indication of dissatisfaction is met with swift action to rectify the situation and ensure a memorable dining experience.

Overall, Radisson Blu offers a spacious and welcoming environment that feels like a home away from home. The combination of stellar service, luxurious rooms, and delectable dining options makes it a standout among the Radisson group of hotels. I wholeheartedly recommend Radisson Blu for an unforgettable stay.

The rooms were spacious, luxurious, and immaculately clean, offering breathtaking views that added a special touch to the experience. Every detail, from the plush bedding to the modern amenities, was thoughtfully designed for ultimate comfort.

The dining options were exceptional, with a wide variety of cuisines expertly prepared by top-notch chefs. The flavors were exquisite, and the ambiance in the restaurants was both elegant and welcoming.

The hotel facilities were world-class, including a stunning pool, a well-equipped fitness center, and a serene spa that provided a perfect retreat. The attention to detail in every corner of the property was remarkable.

text.text:
The Waverly Hotel and Residency is a luxury hotel located in the central business district of Bangalore, India. It offers a range of modern amenities and facilities for both business and leisure travelers. The hotel has 54 well-appointed rooms and suites, each of which comes equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a minibar, and a private bathroom with complimentary toiletries.

In terms of dining, The Waverly Hotel and Residency has a multi-cuisine restaurant that serves Indian, Chinese, and Continental dishes. The hotel also has a bar where guests can enjoy a variety of cocktails and beverages.

Other facilities at the hotel include a rooftop swimming pool, a fitness center, a business center, and conference and banquet halls for events and meetings.

Overall, The Waverly Hotel and Residency is a good choice for travelers looking for a comfortable stay in the heart of Bangalore.

My stay at Gokulam Grand Hotel & Spa in Bangalore was nothing short of exceptional. From the moment I arrived, I was welcomed with warmth and care, setting the tone for a truly remarkable experience.

The hotel’s luxurious ambiance, impeccable cleanliness, and attention to detail are unparalleled. Whether it was the beautifully designed rooms, the indulgent spa treatments, or the delightful culinary offerings, every aspect of my stay exceeded expectations.

A special mention goes to Sachin Muddappa, whose friendly and thoughtful hospitality made all the difference. His genuine approach and willingness to go the extra mile ensured that every need was met with a smile. He truly embodies the spirit of excellent customer service, making guests feel valued and at home.

If you’re looking for a blend of comfort, luxury, and outstanding hospitality in Bangalore, Gokulam Grand Hotel & Spa is the perfect choice. I highly recommend it and look forward to visiting again!

text.text:
My stay at Gokulam Grand Hotel & Spa in Bangalore was nothing short of spectacular. The hotel’s strategic location provides easy access to the city’s key attractions, making it an ideal choice for both business and leisure travelers.

From the moment I arrived, I was impressed by the hotel’s elegant ambiance and warm hospitality. The room was spacious and beautifully furnished, offering a perfect blend of comfort and luxury. The bed was plush and inviting, ensuring a restful night’s sleep. I also appreciated the modern amenities and the meticulous attention to detail, from the complimentary bottled water to the premium toiletries.

The culinary experience at Gokulam Grand is truly exceptional. The breakfast buffet is a feast for the senses, with a wide array of dishes that cater to all palates. Fresh fruits, baked goods, local delicacies, and made-to-order omelets are just a few of the offerings that make the morning meal delightful.

Lunch and dinner at the on-site restaurant were equally impressive. The chefs clearly have a passion for their craft, delivering dishes that are both flavorful and beautifully presented. I savored every meal, from the traditional Indian cuisine to the international dishes that were prepared to perfection. The quality of the ingredients and the creativity in presentation were top-notch, making each dining experience memorable.

The service at Gokulam Grand is second to none. The staff were consistently friendly, professional, and attentive, making sure all my needs were met promptly and efficiently. Their genuine warmth and hospitality made my stay even more enjoyable.

In addition to the superb dining and service, the hotel boasts excellent amenities. The fitness center is well-equipped, and the spa offers a serene escape for relaxation and rejuvenation. The pool area is beautifully maintained, providing a perfect spot to unwind.

Overall, my experience at Gokulam Grand Hotel & Spa was outstanding. It combines luxury, comfort, and impeccable service to create an unforgettable stay. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Bangalore. Make sure to indulge in their extraordinary dining options – you won’t be disappointed!

We recently had the opportunity to stay at Radisson Blu Bengaluru, where we attended a training hosted by the Karnataka State government. The hotel's 5-star facilities and luxurious ambiance made it an ideal setting for our professional development. The training was productive, and we appreciated the hotel's attentive staff and excellent amenities.

The hotel's modern rooms were comfortable and well-appointed, offering stunning views of the city. We enjoyed fine dining at the hotel's restaurants, which served a range of international cuisines. The fitness center, spa, and outdoor pool were perfect for unwinding after a day of training.

The hotel's meeting and event spaces were well-equipped and perfectly suited for our training sessions. The staff were friendly and professional, ensuring that everything ran smoothly. We were impressed by the hotel's attention to detail and commitment to excellence.

Overall, our experience at Radisson Blu Bengaluru was fantastic. The hotel's excellent amenities, stunning views, and exceptional service made it an ideal choice for our training. We would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a comfortable and luxurious stay in Bengaluru. The Karnataka State Rural Livelihood Promotion Society’s choice of venue was spot on, and we're grateful for the opportunity to have stayed and learned in such a great environment.

text.text:
Blu and Beautiful

This is probably one of the best Radisson Blu’s in this region and certainly much better when it comes to luxury and atmosphere compared to the other ones in the city - even though it doesn't have the lovely views that the one near Ulsoor Lake comes with. You will feel like you have entered a world of tranquility and luxury the minute you step into this hotel, leaving behind the commotion and chaos of the city behind.

LOCATION: Nice location near the race course with easy access to all key points of interest

DINE + DRINK: They have a lovely WHISKEY bar and a lobby-level cafe. And breakfast at ATRIA restaurant was a great spread worth waking up for!

ROOM: We stayed in Room 410, so this review is based on that; VIEW: Sweet view of the city and the pool below; SIZE: Spacious enough for 2 adults and simple baggage; AIR-CON: Perfectly functioning cooler that helped in setting the perfect room temperature; BED: Comfortable bed that played the expected part of putting me to sleep; BATHROOM: Stand-in shower; TOILETRIES: Good Radisson Branded Toiletries

FACILITIES: Excellent Gym with a full range of weights and Cardio machines for a fine workout. The outdoor swimming pool is lovely too, but might be cold on cooler days without sun.

SERVICE: Friendly staff that took care of all our needs with a smile and made us feel at home and well taken care of.

HOW WIRED YOU WILL BE: Free high-speed Wi-Fi that works well all over the property. Big Plasma TV screen dishing out a wide variety of channels spanning sports, news, music, movies, and  entertainment in multiple languages

Nestled in the heart of Bangalore, the Radisson Blu Hotel provides a splendid retreat, seamlessly blending modern luxury with warm hospitality. From the moment you enter, you are greeted by an inviting ambiance and an attentive staff dedicated to ensuring an exceptional experience. The rooms are elegantly appointed, featuring contemporary decor and thoughtful amenities that cater to both business and leisure travelers.
The hotel's dining options are noteworthy, offering a delightful array of culinary experiences—from exquisite local dishes to international fare—all beautifully presented and expertly prepared. The spacious, well-equipped fitness center and serene spa provide opportunities for relaxation and rejuvenation, allowing guests to unwind after a busy day.

In addition, the Radisson's strategic location makes it an ideal base for exploring Bangalore’s vibrant culture and bustling business districts. Overall, the Radisson Blu Bangalore stands as a beacon of comfort and sophistication in the city, making it a top choice for discerning travelers seeking a memorable stay. Highly recommended!

**Ambience:**
The Holiday Inn Express OMR in Bangalore boasts a vibrant and inviting atmosphere. The modern decor, tasteful interiors, and comfortable seating areas create a pleasant environment for guests. Whether it's the lobby, dining area, or rooms, the ambiance is stylish yet cozy, providing a relaxing stay experience.

**Food:**
The hotel offers a delightful culinary experience. The variety and quality of dishes served, be it during breakfast or other meals, are impressive. The menu caters to different tastes, with a range of options that are well-prepared and delicious. The freshness of ingredients and the attention to flavors contribute to a satisfying dining experience.

**Quality:**
The overall quality of services and amenities provided by Holiday Inn Express OMR is commendable. From the cleanliness of the rooms to the functionality of facilities like the gym or business center, the hotel maintains high standards. The attention to detail in ensuring guests' comfort and satisfaction reflects the hotel's commitment to quality service.

**Service:**
The staff at Holiday Inn Express OMR is exceptional. Their warmth, professionalism, and willingness to assist create a welcoming environment for guests. Whether it's the front desk, housekeeping, or restaurant staff, their attentiveness and promptness in addressing any concerns or requests enhance the overall stay experience.

Overall, Holiday Inn Express OMR in Bangalore offers a fantastic blend of excellent ambience, delicious food, high-quality services, and outstanding hospitality. It's a place where guests can enjoy a comfortable stay while receiving top-notch service from a friendly and efficient staff.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Hilton Garden Inn, Manyata, Bangalore for four days, and the experience was nothing short of amazing! From the moment I stepped in, I was greeted with warm hospitality, and the check-in process was seamless, thanks to Manan at the reception, who ensured everything was handled with professionalism and efficiency.

The housekeeping team deserves a special mention for maintaining impeccable cleanliness throughout my stay. My room was always spotless, well-stocked with essentials, and had a fresh, inviting ambiance every day. It truly felt like a home away from home!

The facilities at the hotel were top-notch, catering to both business and leisure travelers. Whether it was the well-equipped gym, the relaxing lounge areas, or the efficient room service, every aspect added to the comfort of my stay.

A highlight of my experience was the breakfast spread—absolutely delightful! The variety of dishes, the freshness of ingredients, and the attentive staff made every morning a treat. Whether you prefer continental options or local delicacies, the choices were plentiful and delicious.

Overall, Hilton Garden Inn, Manyata, Bangalore, exceeded my expectations in every way. The exceptional service, well-maintained amenities, and the courteous staff made my stay truly memorable. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Bangalore—whether for business or leisure!

We just checked out after a weekend staycation and it was perfect. This is undoubtedly one of the best stays we have had recently.

From the front desk to concierge to the restaurant staff to housekeeping staff everyone was so courteous and made our stay extra comfortable. Not taking any names here as the list has so many. I was also touched by the fact that the Chef herself gave a tour of the buffet spread in the restaurant.

text.text:
I recently was at Fairfield by Marriott in Rajajinagar, and it was a pleasant experience overall. The hotel offers a great blend of comfort and convenience, making it an excellent choice for both business and leisure travelers. The rooms are well-appointed, clean, and equipped with all the necessary amenities, including high-speed internet and comfortable beds. The housekeeping staff does a commendable job of maintaining the rooms to a high standard.

The highlight of my stay was the exceptional service provided by the hotel staff. They were always courteous, attentive, and ready to assist with any requests. The breakfast buffet at Kava restaurant was delightful, offering a wide variety of delicious options to start the day right.

However, the ambience of the hotel could use some improvement. While the common areas are clean and functional, they lack the warmth and modernity that one might expect from a Marriott property.

Despite these minor drawbacks, Fairfield by Marriott Rajajinagar is a solid choice for a comfortable stay and great food in Bengaluru. The excellent service and well-maintained rooms make it a place I would recommend and return to. Four stars for a great overall experience!.

text.text:
Our experience at the Hilton Embassy was nothing short of extraordinary, thanks to the impeccable hospitality and personalized care provided by Sourav and the entire team. From the moment we arrived, Sourav went above and beyond to make our stay unforgettable. He should definitely be promoted and they should hire more people like him.

He ensured we had access to the finest amenities, including luxurious spa treatments that helped us unwind, a sumptuous buffet with an array of delectable dishes, and opulent rooms that truly elevated our stay. His attention to detail and warm demeanor stood out as he personally escorted us to our room, making us feel truly special and welcomed.

The culinary experience at the buffet was outstanding, with an impressive variety of dishes that catered to every palate. Each meal was a delightful journey of flavors, and the service was impeccable.

The level of care, attention, and luxury we experienced is a testament to Hilton Embassy’s commitment to excellence. A special shoutout to Sourav for making our visit so memorable. We will definitely be returning and highly recommend this property to anyone seeking a perfect blend of luxury and world-class service.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Hilton, I stayed here for my birthday celebration and I must say, it was an absolutely fantastic experience from start to finish. This 5-star gem exceeded all my expectations, offering a level of luxury and service that left a lasting impression.
The room was nothing short of a sanctuary. Impeccably designed, with attention to every detail, it felt like a home away from home. The plush bedding, tasteful decor, and breathtaking greenery golf view from the window created an ambiance of pure indulgence.
The staff at Hilton truly understands the meaning of hospitality. From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warmth and professionalism. The receptionist was knowledgeable and always ready to assist, making recommendations for local attractions and ensuring all my needs were met promptly.

Dining at the hotel was a culinary delight. The on-site restaurants boasted an impressive array of dishes, each a masterpiece in its own right. The breakfast buffet was a highlight and the live counters were amazing offering a wide selection of fresh, high-quality options to suit every palate.

The hotel spared no expense in providing top-notch amenities. The  fitness center featured state-of-the-art equipment. The attention to detail in maintaining cleanliness and order throughout the facilities was evident.

In conclusion, Hilton has set the bar exceptionally high for what a 5-star hotel experience should be. The combination of luxurious accommodations, impeccable service, and attention to detail made my stay truly unforgettable. I look forward to returning and highly recommend Hilton to anyone seeking a refined and indulgent retreat.

text.text: I stayed at Hilton GolfLinks for 3 months and will be going back. I  had the best experience here the hospitality, the food, the room, the amenities everything is top notch. The staff is so nice and caring they really go out of their way to make you feel comfortable. They even checked up on me everyday while I was sick. I really enjoyed the breakfast every morning where I used to get my morning coffee the way I want it without even asking for it. I also really appreciated the reception staff who gives you the warmest welcome. I also never really felt the need to go to a Salon outside the hotel campus as the tattva spa is fabulous. The rooms are so well equipped and if you need anything extra thats taken care off as well. I look forward to staying there again.  I have stayed at a lot of hotels all over the world but this one beats all of them in hospitality.

A Luxurious Stay with Excellent Comfort and Hospitality

I recently stayed at this 4-star property and was thoroughly impressed by the overall experience. The hotel exudes luxury from the moment you walk in — from the elegant interiors to the warm welcome by the reception staff, who were courteous, helpful, and efficient throughout the stay.

The room was a highlight: spacious, impeccably clean, and filled with natural sunlight during the day. The view from the room was lovely, adding a refreshing touch to the mornings. Thoughtful amenities like a mini bar, tea/coffee maker, and a spotless bathroom made the stay even more comfortable.

Food lovers will be delighted — the in-house dining options offered a wide variety of delicious dishes, catering to diverse tastes. Every meal was a treat, with both quality and variety standing out.

Room service was prompt and professional, ensuring every request was handled quickly and with a smile. Overall, this hotel offers a perfect balance of comfort, luxury, and top-notch hospitality. Highly recommended for both leisure and business travelers!

text.text:
**Angsana Oasis Resort Bangalore: A Tranquil Retreat**

Located in the bustling city of Bangalore, Angsana Oasis Resort offers a serene escape from the urban chaos. Nestled amidst lush greenery, this resort is an oasis of calm and relaxation.

**Ambiance:**
The moment you step into Angsana Oasis Resort, you are greeted by the soothing sounds of nature and the refreshing aroma of flowers. The resort's architecture seamlessly blends with its natural surroundings, creating a tranquil atmosphere that instantly puts you at ease.

**Accommodation:**
The resort offers a range of accommodation options, from spacious rooms to luxurious suites, each designed to provide utmost comfort and privacy. The rooms are tastefully decorated with modern amenities and offer stunning views of the surrounding greenery.

**Dining:**
Angsana Oasis Resort boasts an array of dining options that cater to every palate. From authentic local cuisine to international delicacies, the resort's restaurants serve up a gastronomic delight that is sure to please even the most discerning food connoisseur.

**Facilities:**
Whether you're looking to relax by the poolside, indulge in a rejuvenating spa treatment, or engage in outdoor activities like tennis or cycling, Angsana Oasis Resort has something for everyone. The resort also offers excellent conference and event facilities, making it an ideal choice for both leisure and business travelers.

**Service:**
What truly sets Angsana Oasis Resort apart is its impeccable service. The staff goes above and beyond to ensure that every guest's needs are met with utmost care and attention to detail. Whether it's arranging for special requests or providing recommendations for exploring the city, the staff's warm hospitality adds a personal touch to the overall experience.

**Overall Experience:**
My stay at Angsana Oasis Resort was nothing short of exceptional. From the moment I arrived until the moment I departed, I was treated to a level of hospitality that exceeded my expectations. The serene ambiance, luxurious accommodation, delectable dining options, and attentive service made my stay truly unforgettable. I would highly recommend Angsana Oasis Resort to anyone looking for a tranquil retreat in the heart of Bangalore

text.text: One of the best places to visit with family or a team! The resort is exceptionally well-maintained, with a pleasant and relaxing ambience. The food is delicious, and the rooms are both luxurious and spotless. The service was excellent, especially thanks to Ramchandra and the entire team. Highly recommended.
